thread.title: Simon Little
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Simon Little

author: Simon Little
title: Simon Little
text: Item was delivered very quickly. I especially liked the ease of checking on the location of my parcel through DHL - this allowed me to ensure I was able to be home for delivery. Little communication from the company, but none was really needed. I would order items from them again.
